attributes.action: Mr Ethienne Tshisekedi Elected President in The 28/11/2011 Democratic Republic Of Congo (DRC)
attributes.additional_details: Mr Etienne Tshisekedi was elected as the President of DRC on 28/11/2011 presidential Election by the Congolese people but Mr Kabila is using Military force and fraud to steal the power.  We want the respect of the choice of the Congolese.  We want the International Community to intervene to avoid bloodshed.  Many foreign observers such as The Carter Centre have witnessed the election and have confirmed that Mr Etienne Tshisekedi has won the election.
